movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief, who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.
movies.plot: A thief with the ability to enter people's dreams takes on the ultimate heist: planting an idea in someone's mind.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman sets out to dismantle the remaining criminal organizations that plague Gotham City, but he soon finds himself prey to a reign of chaos unleashed by a rising criminal mastermind known as The Joker.
movies.plot: Batman faces his greatest challenge yet as he battles the Joker, a criminal mastermind wreaking havoc on Gotham City.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
movies.plot: An Alabama man with a low IQ experiences and influences significant historical events while trying to reunite with his childhood sweetheart.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
movies.plot: A hacker discovers the reality he lives in is a simulated reality and joins a rebellion to free humanity from its controllers.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
movies.plot: The story of the powerful Italian-American crime family of Don Vito Corleone and his youngest son's transformation into a ruthless mafia boss.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster, and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
movies.plot: The intertwining stories of hitmen, a boxer, and a gangster's wife in a non-linear narrative.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies.plot: Two imprisoned men form a deep bond and find solace and redemption over the years.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.
movies.plot: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club with a soap salesman, leading to unforeseen consequences.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
movies.plot: A Hobbit and eight companions embark on a quest to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.
movies.plot: A young farm boy, Luke Skywalker, embarks on a journey to save Princess Leia and defeat the evil Galactic Empire.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
movies.plot: A romance unfolds between a wealthy young woman and a poor artist aboard the ill-fated Titanic.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
movies.plot: A group of superheroes team up to save the world from an extraterrestrial threat.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.
movies.plot: A theme park showcasing genetically-engineered dinosaurs turns deadly when the creatures escape their enclosures.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
movies.plot: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after the murder of his father, only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
movies.plot: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
movies.plot: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole to find a new habitable planet for humanity.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
movies.plot: A Marine on an alien planet must choose between following orders and protecting the native inhabitants.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
movies.plot: An F.B.I. cadet seeks the help of a manipulative cannibal to catch a serial killer who skins his victims.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
movies.plot: The true story of Oskar Schindler, who saved over a thousand Jews from the Holocaust by employing them in his factories.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito.
movies.plot: The rise and fall of Henry Hill as he becomes involved in organized crime.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
movies.plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
movies.plot: The story of a death row corrections officer who witnesses supernatural events surrounding an inmate with a miraculous gift.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption, and the federal government.
movies.plot: The rise and fall of Jordan Belfort, a stockbroker who engages in rampant corruption and fraud.

movies.title: Alien
movies.description: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.
movies.plot: The crew of a space vessel encounters a deadly alien life form after receiving a distress call.

movies.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
movies.plot: A group of U.S. soldiers risk their lives to find and bring home a soldier whose brothers were killed in action.

movies.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
movies.description: In 1938, after his father goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against the Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.
movies.plot: Indiana Jones teams up with his estranged father to find the Holy Grail before the Nazis.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.
movies.plot: Two magicians become bitter rivals after a tragic accident and compete to create the ultimate stage illusion.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.description: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.
movies.plot: The story of Facebook's founding and the lawsuits that followed its success.

movies.title: Toy Story
movies.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.
movies.plot: A cowboy doll feels threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure becomes the top toy in a boy's room.

movies.title: The Incredibles
movies.description: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.
movies.plot: A family of undercover superheroes is forced into action to save the world.

movies.title: Finding Nemo
movies.description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
movies.plot: A clownfish embarks on a journey to find his son, who was captured and taken to Sydney.
